question: I take medication for diabetes, nerve medication, blood pressure, pain meds and cholestoral and have gone through surgery in the spine.(T-6--T-12) , brain anuerysms (5)coiled. I suffer with numbness in the legs and feet from the waist down. My problem I want to ask is why my legs are very shiny in the shen area.They are shiny when swollen or not swollen.
title: shiny legs
